choices: Big 1 (after the battle with the Armata fleet)
1.content: When Manobo returns to Planet Destine he see his mom at Big 1's Platform but to his surprise he see someone he never expect
1.title: A Giant help

11.content:
Frell came into view at destiny station waiting on big 1 and sirrus platoon to arrive from their vacation. She was anxious to join Manobo and the others onboard Big1. The station master stopped her and asked for a pass. She showed it to him and she walked in the station platform. She took a seat on the bench waiting for her favorit engine and crew.

Frell: (woken from a whistle) uh gu BIG1, can you still hear me?"
Big1: depends ready for the real world Frell?"
Frell: Yes God danmit yes!"
Big1 chuckled at her happiness but quickly told her bad news.

Big1: Frell no one is onboard me cause their sick and captin bulge got shot in the legs. The shot nearly took his leg off and kill him. He may never walk again. Frell? Frell are you ok?"
Frell: first day as a member of sirrus platoon and they may nolong exsist?" (softy crys)
Big1: sorry Frell that's how life is, come on I'll take you to destiny."

Frell climbed slowy into Big1's cab and tender but his lights were out. Sunddley Big1 whistle loudly ans David, Yuki, Manobo, Luis, Bulge and Todo( bribed buy Lela) flipped the lights on and scarred her to fall backwards and on her ass.

David: Welcome to the team Frell!"
Bulge: you want a hand up?"

Frell to his hand but then realized this was a prank.

Frell: hey big1 do you have a Human form?"
Big1: yup, why?"
Frell: join the party?"
11.title: New Crew Member

12.content:
When Manobo returns to Planet Destine he His Dad Alive And not a ghost. "Use This Gun That Destine Gave me." Said Manobo
"O.K." Said Wataru. HE Shoots and Hits Manabu but how big is He
12.title: Return of a Yuuki

14.content:
" Big 1." Said Manobo And The door moves open And See Destine.
" Do you like The New Big 1, I Have something for you. Close Your eyes And Hold Out You Hands." Said Destine
"O.K. What Is This Thing?" "It's a Growth and Shrink Gun, It was made for you only and you can only shrink people or Grow Your Self. Use It on me and see What happens." "O,K," Said Manobo.

He Pulls The Trigger and it hits Destine And Kania (By Accident). They Shrink To...........
14.title: New Big 1 With Destine

choices: we want you to be a giant
We Want You To Protect us
141.content:
He Pulls The Trigger and it hits Destine And Kania (By Accident). They Shrink To 10 INCHES.

" O.K. I went to far did i?" Said Manabu
" No, This is great . This is what i alway wanted Manabu, This was my dream to be with my son as a giant. your father would be so proud of you right now if he was alive right now." Said Kanna. " And Besides we get to be with you until we want back to normal." said Destine.

"o.k.o.k. under only 1 thing, don't bug me 24/7 got it?"
"Got it" Said both of them. Then Manabu grabbed both women and carefully smiled at them then took both of them to his room to sleep. as the night go's on the girls got worried that they mite forget to ask Manabu To Help Them In the morning. They sleep and Manabu noticed That he was taller than he was.
" I think Kanna Did this to me." " and i did Manabu, I just can't help it, i love you as a giant even tho we shrunk, but we set it to grow you only. Because......
141.title: Holly Crap What have i Done

1412.content:
Because we want you to be a giant, Manabu" Said Kanna " What did i say about bugging me Kanna? Said Manabu Pissed Off. " O Come on Manabu, i'm your mother, i can do anything i want can i Destine?" " Not Technical, see Manabu Has A better advantage agents us, how tall did you make your son Kanna? Said Destine. " 9ft 9" " WHAT!!!!!!!" Said Manabu " Your insane Mom. Turning me into a giant is 1 thing, but 9ft 9, that's crazy mom!!!!!!!" Now Angry Manabu.

" How a'm i to get inside of Big 1 now, If anyone saw me they might think al eat them or something, I mean look at me i look like"
"Like a hot giant SPD." Said Destine "What!?" Said Kanna And Manabu " Only I can Say Hes Hot." "Yea, What?" Said Manabu " Got You"
"DAMN!!!!!!!!" Said Manabu " Can I shrink Sirius Platoon Destine, Sow they Can feel like what it means to shrink?" Said Manabu

" Sure, Why not, they pick on you so you can get payback?" Said Destine
"I'll Shrink Them at A Fake Meeting, I'll Shrink Them To.......
1412.title: WHAT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

14121.content:
I'll Shrink Them To ( With big 1 ) 10 INCHES, Then I get to toucher them?" Said Manabu " Sure." "I'll Call All OF The Sirius Platoon members and crew and when they come to my room, BAM, We shrink them all and pretend to eat them." Said Destine " Shrink Big 1 First As A Trap Then use knock-out gas, when their are asleep shrink them to 10 INCHES, put them on your bed till they awake up." Said Kanna, " But Keep Loise in Your hands, O.K." " O man this plan work nicely!!!!" screamed Destine And Kanna (note Since Big 1 Talk In Episode 20 In season 2, he can talk in this story. so don't forget big 1 too) After the plan work Manabu laid down with everybody on his chest and Loise was on his forehead sleeping not knowing that she would wake up on a head.

" Al man, what happened, one minute i was fired up then the next thing i know i'm sleep, this is not the roundhouse." Said Big 1 " Where are we and why are we in a room? Said Bulge. Suddenly Loise Woke up to find herself shrink and on his forehead. At the same time big 1 blew as loud as he could and woke everybody up including Manabu, Kanna And Destine

" What are you doing guy's, this room is looked up no one get's out. GOT IT!!!!!!!!!!" Said Manabu Kanna jump on his shoulders and looked down on his friends. " Manabu!!!" Said Yuki "What" "Can I stay with you?" " uhhhhhhh, Sure if it's o.k. with everybody else" Said Manabu They all Agreed that they would stay with Manabu. After the agreement Manabu Went to get dinner for everybody since he would eat last. But he hit his head on the railing of his door and fell back. "O.K. i'm lowering my hight to 8ft 8" Said Manabu And was able to fit thought the door but noticed that Loise was in his collar after shrinking a little bit. Loise Asked Manabu to take her to her room to get her clothes. after retiring with the clothes. Loise said to shrink them so she can wear them someday. Then Somebody asked to get their stuff. who asked.........
14121.title: The helping hand

141211.content:
"Called It!!!!" Said David " No I need to get my train here and now David!!!!!!!!" Said Big 1 " O you want to fight how go's next" "Sure" They Fought for 4 hours start and put Manabu and everyone els asleep. then they stopped , then the Alarm went off about a G-S 4 Train was landing on the planet.Manabu took everyone but Big 1 And David Since they ignore the Alarm. Manabu Saw the train and read it's number and train type. "Loise, Destine, Bulge We have a Southern Pacific Daylight #4449." "Do Not touch ME!!!!!!!!!!!!." said a voice. "Who said that?" Said Manabu. " I did. My Name Is Daylight, #4449, Last of the Southern Pacific G-S 4's. I'm a time Train and so i thought you might want to see you father Manabu Yuuki." Said Daylight. As soon as he got done this his sentence, The Cab Door open and jumped out Wataru Yuuki Kanna Jumped From his shoulders and landed on his hat."Daylight you have a face?" Said Yuki " Yes, Plus i got to have arms to and I Got To keep my MARS lights with the number plates." Said Daylight.

Manabu ran to his dad and woke him up, Since he was still holding the handle to Daylight from the cab. " Dad it's me Manabu." " Hu " Said Wataru. "Manabu Why are you a giant?" " Never mind That take off your hat and look." Said Daylight. " KANNA!!!!!!!!" Screamed Wataru " Wataru It;s So good to see you my loving captain." Said Kanna. soon he saw the gun and told Manabu To Shrink him. "When Will it end with the shrinking?!?!?!?!?!" Said Manabu then flopped on his back. Soon he shrunk his father to 11 INCHES but told Him why. "Cause since you were Captain first You can be a Inches Taller." Said Kanna " One Thing, Can You Disconnect me from the Passenger Cars With The Cannons on all of them, I Want to Show you guys something?" Said Daylight

They Uncoupled And Daylight Moved Forward. Then Transformed. " Surprised, This Engine Was hit by a comet but it Chanced my way forever, if that Comet never hit me i would not be here right now." Said Daylight Should i...........
141211.title: The Train Named Daylight

choices: Keep Trying its not the right Tender
1412112.content:
"Hot Dam I told that i Can't find May i Can't return home." Said daylight and fell on his face. Yuki Tried to cumfret him but couldn't. Daylight Didn't Move For 2 Weeks and he had a 5:00 beard. Soon Watura Came up to try to talk But Nothing Worked Until something happened. A Coald of smoke come out of nowhere. Then came the ghost of May.: Daylight,Daylight get up now and listen!!" Screamed Mays ghost " Come On it's me May,Your sister, Come her And hug me!" Said May Daylight Did then May floated into the sky.

" That's it, now it's gotten personal Get Manabu and everybody now from Sirius Platoon Now!" Demanded Daylight. He wanted his sister found Dead Or Alive At all cause. Soon Daylight took them to the crash site and entered the Bottom of Gravity. Soon they come across a tender and they.......
1412112.title: Ghost #99

choices: She Falls asleep In the Train (after She Ask Manobo to shrink her to his size)
14121122.content:
Keep Trying its not the right Tender

"Guys Do You want to know What happened on the day of the wreck?" Said Daylight "I do" Said Big 1 ( on the union pacific he was the 4001 o.k.) "Fine. Me and May we were apart of the American Freedom Train and we used our new warp engine to travel to different worlds then we past the bottom of gravity. i waned may about lowering her boiler power BUTT NO she ignored me and did it any when we swapped places big mistake. When we left the last planet May was Sick and i felt like pucking on a orbital bridge then we stopped for a quick seconded The the Coupler on me snaps And May was knot out from the shove she Transformed And So did i but i couldn't reach her so i go in but slipped and graped the first Couch And move the train Back. the Conductor ran up to see me bent over seeing my sister fall in to the hole. Today i travel as the lone surviver of all G-S Call Southern Pacific class Daylight Locomotives looking for help. So that why i came to planet Destiny looking for the hero of the rails big 1." Explained Daylight.

" Daylight" Said Manobo " We"ll Help find your sister i know we will right Guys, mom, Destiny!" "Right Full steam a head"
" hold on let Me do the driving With My Clone O.K." " Fine, We Got something on train radar it's a G-S 4 Daylight." Daylight Herd What Wataru said And apiled all breaks and came to a complete stop " Thats my sisters model number what's the side number?!!" "4438 " Said Big1 " That May, Full Reveres"Daylight opened the reveres wide and got to the train and told everybody out and in to the clone. Soon they climbed in the clone and daylight Transformed again and they found May

"May Wake up it's me daylight May" Said Daylight May finally woke up "Day Daylight" Said May "Yes Sister It's Me" Said Daylight Soon May cried and Her big brother for the first time ever she felt in love.
14121122.title: They found her

141211222.content:
When May Was Manobo's size,she took control of Daylight But Fell asleep again. Out in the distance 6 More locomotives was heading strait for the. Daylight slammed on the breaks mistakenly waking may up from the shove then transformed into a giant robot again leaving everyone inside.

"Five's where are you taking us".Said A Voice. The Voice Was Chaz Huprich The Leader OF The Iron 5 AKA "New Philadelphia Southern Pacific Rail Rescue" or "NPSPRR" for Short. "Shut Up Chaz". Voice 2 Said. that Was Seth Huprich Including Rick, Sherrlye,and Ian. "Very Soon Chaz". Said 4005.

"Hey is that Daylight and May"Said Ian
They Stop and ..........................
141211222.title: Heres 4005 and the Huprichs

info.brief_description: Manobo turns 21 and get a giant surprise from a train
info.description: When Manobo returns to Planet Destine he see his mom at Big 1's Platform but to his surprise he see someone he never expect
